articles.title: NASA Rover Captures Rock Showing Possible Signs of Microbial Life - VOA Learning English
articles.description: A NASA rover exploring Mars has captured a rock that scientists say shows possible signs of ancient microbial life. In a statement, the American space agency said the rock shows signs of “chemical signatures and structures” possibly formed by life billions of…
articles.content:
A Mars explorer operated by the American space agency NASA has captured a rock that scientists say shows possible signs of ancient microbial life.
